short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy muting/unmuting for when you're using Gather Town.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Google Chrome extension that makes it easy to mute, unmute and use push-to-talk in Gather Town tabs.
Installation

Usage
The Extension has 4 commands: Mute, Unmute, Toggle Mute and Push to talk

After installing, don't forget to configure your shortcuts in: chrome://extensions/shortcuts

I recommend using global shortcuts, so you can control gather without needing to focus on Chrome Window.

This project is dedicated to Michele Jader Pandini, my eternal wife, and the best Girlfriend this world has ever seen.

This is an opensource project, you can check it out at https://github.com/Aeradon/gather-mute
